oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stress Reduction in Beef Cattle by Improving Human-Animal-Relationships
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Probst, Johanna K.
Leiber, Florian
Hillmann, Edna
Kreuzer, Michael
Spengler Neff, Anet
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Beef cattle
Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Farms keeping suckler cows often face the problem of wild behaviour of their animals. Especially loose-housing and grazing systems with low management input cause frail relationships between humans and animals.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Probst, Johanna K.; Leiber, Florian; Hillmann, Edna; Kreuzer, Michael and Spengler Neff, Anet (2008) Stress Reduction in Beef Cattle by Improving Human-Animal-Relationships. Poster at: [Completed]
